DOC.brief_title: Strategies Maintain Cardiac Risk Control After Discharge From Cardiovascular Risk Reduction Clinic
DOC.criteria: Previous enrollment Cardiovascular Risk Reduction Clinic ( CRRC ) Eligible CRRC discharge : 1 . For DM patient : HbA1c < 7.0 % , BP < 130/85 mm Hg , LDL < 100 mg/dl ; 2 . For NonDM patient : BP < 140/90 mm Hg , LDL < 100 mg/dl ; Able willing sign inform consent . Presence condition might limit longterm compliance ( eg , dementia , acute psychiatric decompensation within previous 6 month , unstable psychiatric disorder ) ; Metastatic disease terminal illness
